oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Bishop Leonidas Polk to his wife, Fanny
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this letter, Bishop Polk questions the guilt of the person accused of burning their home in Sewanee, Tenn. He was anxious about his wife's unhappiness with the prosecution of the case and gave orders to have it dismissed. They worried that an innocent man was charged with the crime.
